amendment.description: To require the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to report to Congress on issues with respect to small businesses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2141 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2141 proposed by Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S3497-3500, S3500-3501, S3507; text: CR S3497) To require the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to report to Congress on issues with respect to small businesses.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2141 proposed by Senator Cardin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2141 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
